page.title: 04ARMED FORCES IN MYDDLE
page.content: {THE ARMY There are quite a few {ARMED FORCES} that go through {MYDDLE. Different regiments go through at different times depending on which regiment is on manoevers at one time. Most regiments have in it {ARMOURED {CARS}and {SCORPION TANKS }and { {LANDROVERS }which are the most common. Nearly all of the {TANKS, }and { {LANDROVERS }etc go to {NESSCLIFFE {TRAINING AREA. {R.A.F. The {GAZELLE}helicopters are used for training pilots for the {ARMED FORCES. The {WESSEX}helicopters are used for weight training for new pilots. The{LYNX}helicopters are just visiting {R.A.F.SHAWBURY.}The {JET PROVOST} planes are used by the {CENTRAL {NAVIGATION SCHOOL.
